SELECT sp.ID, sp.NUM, sp.MONEY, d1.DEPT_NAME AS toDeptName FROM cy_storeroom_put_out AS sp LEFT JOIN t_dept AS d1 ON (d1.DEPT_ID = sp.TO_DEPT_ID) WHERE sp.IS_PUT = '2' AND sp.TYPE_APPLICATION = '5'
AND sp.NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sOut.num},'%')
SELECT DISTINCT PUT_ID FROM p_storeroom_put WHERE FIND_IN_SET(STOREROOM_ID,#{storeroomIds})
SELECT DISTINCT OUT_ID FROM p_storeroom_out WHERE FIND_IN_SET(STOREROOM_ID,#{storeroomIds})

SELECT cspo.NUM, psp.PUT_ID AS id, COUNT(cs2.ID) AS `count` FROM cy_storeroom AS cs LEFT JOIN p_storeroom_put AS psp ON(cs.ID=psp.STOREROOM_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS cspo ON(cspo.ID=psp.PUT_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom AS cs2 ON(cs2.PARENT_ID=cs.PARENT_ID) WHERE cs2.IS_IN=2 AND FIND_IN_SET(psp.PUT_ID, #{storeroomPutIdStr}) GROUP BY psp.PUT_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE cy_application AS ca LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom_put_out AS cspo ON(cspo.APPLICATION_ID=ca.ID) SET ca.PROCESS=1 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(cspo.ID, #{storeroomPutIdStr})
UPDATE cy_storeroom AS cs LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom AS cs2 ON(cs2.ID=cs.PARENT_ID) SET cs2.AMOUNT=(cs2.AMOUNT+cs.AMOUNT) WHERE FIND_IN_SET(cs.ID, #{storeroomIdsStr})
